task.title: Configure Age-Based Setting Access
task.shortdesc: Set age-based access to Google services

taskbody.context: You can designate your users’ age level in the Admin console. If you don’t, all users without an age designation get the default experience for your institution type.

step.cmd: From the Admin console Home page, click Account settings > Age-based access settings.

To apply the setting to everyone, leave the top organizational unit selected. Otherwise, select a child organizational unit or a configuration group. For Choose an appropriate age label, choose an option: Some or all users are under 18 years of age or All users are 18 or older
Click Save. If you configured an organizational unit or group, you might be able to either Inherit or Override a parent organizational unit, or Unset a group.
